entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
